description:
There’s some kind of magic in words.

They have an unlimited power of influence and they can cause a great impact, a bad one or any at all. Have you ever felt like your writing wasn’t good enough? Perhaps you’ve wanted to get the attention of a potential reader, but you just couldn’t. And it is understandable because nowadays society is full of distractions. In fact, many people have shorter attention spans than before.

Attracting a reader doesn’t necessarily mean that he or she will continue reading your entire text. Writing in a seductive way requires certain elements you are about to find out.

Seductive Writing teaches copywriting skills attract, engage and captivate your readers. You'll learn how to:

  • craft eye-catching titles,
  • design effective text starters,
  • develop a realistic writing style,
  • use the five senses and
  • appeal to the emotions,

among other professional writing strategies. if you are a fiction or non-fiction writer, a blogger, an entrepreneur, a speaker or social media marketer you will benefit from it. Plus, you'll get exclusive feedback from the optional practise on the Discussion Board. This course has everything you need to turn your words into a memorable experience.
title: Copywriting for Bloggers
